entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 07:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4 except zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
